## taskToGCPService() function

Defines a task which makes a HTTP requests to a GCP service (using a service account).

**Signature:**

```typescript
taskToGCPService: (config: TaskToGCPServiceConfig) => {
    parent: string;
    task: {
        name: string;
        httpRequest: {
            body: string;
            headers: {
                'Content-Type': string;
                'X-Task-Enqueued-By': string;
            };
            httpMethod: "POST";
            oidcToken: {
                audience: string;
                serviceAccountEmail: string;
            };
            url: string;
        };
        scheduleTime: {
            seconds: number;
        };
        dispatchDeadline: {
            seconds: number;
        };
    };
}
```
